content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make andrea s blanket size 13 sizes available from lovey up to king size skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn bernat blanket or any chenille super bulky weight yarn this pattern is worked with a fun and simple stitch repeat i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #andreasblanket refund there are no refunds on patterns you can find this pattern for free on my blog with ads at cjdesignblog com resell finished product with pattern credit © 2024 cj design all rights reserved
